title: Avail Now! - Spacious and Updated 2 Bedroom in Brighton Center!
posting_body: Available for a lease starting sometime between now and Aug 15th!
(Move-in costs are First, Last, 1 Month SD, 1 Month Broker's Fee)
Sunny and Updated 2 Bedroom/1 Bath apartment located on Shanley St in Brighton Center.
This location is right off of Washington St in the heart of Brighton Center!
Steps to the 501 Express Bus to Boston, close to numerous restaurants and cafes, and within walking distance St Elizabeth's Medical Center and Franciscan Children's Hospital.
This neighborhood is considered Very Walkable - Scoring 88 out of 100 for a Walk Score.

This apartment features hardwood flooring throughout, lots of closet space, a renovated eat-in kitchen with granite counters and a dishwasher, an updated bathroom, two large bedrooms, and a good-sized living room.
There is no laundry in the building, the closest laundromat is 5 minutes walking distance, and they have wash/folder service.
The move-in costs: First Month, Last Month, 1 Month Security Deposit, and 1 Month Broker's Fee.
- No Laundry in Building (Laundromat is close by)
- Free on-street parking with a residential sticker
Tenants pay for Gas and Electric.
